mapper.sql: select account_no as accountNo, member_id as memberId, amount , c.name as goodsCl , c2.name as goods , a.available, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate from account a, COMM_CODE c, comm_code c2 where (c.code_id = 100 and a.goods_cl = c.code) and (c2.code_id = 110 and a.goods_code = c2.code)
mapper.select: select A.ACCOUNT_NUMBER as accountNo , C.MEMBER_ID as memberId , A.BALANCE AS AMOUNT , NULL AS goodsCl , A.ACCOUNT_NAME as goods , NULL AS available , to_char(A.OPEN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate from CONNECTED_ACCT C, O_ACCOUNT@ORCL_TO_HJORCL_LINK A WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = A.ID

select TO_CHAR(A.ACCOUNT_NUMBER, '09999999999999') as accountNo , C.MEMBER_ID as memberId , A.BALANCE AS AMOUNT , NULL AS goodsCl , A.ACCOUNT_NAME as goods , NULL AS available , to_char(A.OPEN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate from CONNECTED_ACCT C, O_ACCOUNT@ORCL_TO_SYORCL_LINK A WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = A.ID
